---
title: "time_series_investigations"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r}

rm(list = ls())
source("header.R")

df <- st_read("data/mst/hex_merged_w_stats.gpkg")

```

#General Plot
```{r}

years <- seq(1885, 1965, 10)

year_select <- years[1]

for (year_select in years) {
  
  g <- ggplot(data = df %>% filter(year == year_select)) +
    geom_sf(aes(fill = hom_ct_sum)) +
    facet_wrap(vars(bk_res_1))  + 
    theme_minimal() + 
    labs(title = year_select)
  
  
  plot(g)
  
}
 
```

#General Plot
```{r}

years <- seq(1885, 1965, 10)

year_select <- years[1]

for (year_select in years) {
  
  g <- ggplot(data = df %>% filter(year == year_select)) +
    geom_sf(aes(fill = hom_rt_mean, color = bk_res_1)) +
    theme_minimal() + 
    labs(title = year_select)
  
  
  plot(g)
  
}
 
```
